definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: He squirmed out of the straps of his backpack.
sentences.chinese: 他扭动身体，挣开背包的肩带。

sentences.english: The handy green cord makes it easy for you to carry it along.
sentences.chinese: 它有一条方便的绿色肩带，便于你随身携带。

sentences.english: It is illegal for men to be seen publicly in any kind of strapless gown.
sentences.chinese: 男性被公然见到穿著任何无肩带礼服是违法的。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the function of Shoulder Belt Protector in preventing the dislocation of shoulder for brain apoplexy patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨护肩带对脑卒中患者肩关节脱位的预防作用。

sentences.english: The bra should stay up even without the straps in place.
sentences.chinese: 文胸应在没有肩带时也保持挺拔。

sentences.english: He was given a sash emblazoned with “Mr. Bear Arabia, ” and draped it over his bare chest as other men offered congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 他把肩带披在赤裸的前胸，其它男人纷纷上前祝贺。

sentences.english: Simple style with strapless and geometric necklines.
sentences.chinese: 无肩带简洁设计搭配几何形领口。

sentences.english: We took the curved-shape splint instead of the figure-of-eight splint for immobilization.
sentences.chinese: 我们采用弧形夹板取代八字肩带的固定。
可拆卸的尼龙肩带可调。
无肩带的内衣集成振动器。
横身可拆卸和可调节的肩带。

sentences.english: Faux-leather upper with textured straps and solid trim.
sentences.chinese: 人造皮革鞋面与质感的肩带和坚实的修剪。

sentences.english: Then, he had accepted the treatment consisted of a figure-of-eight splint and sling immobilization.
sentences.chinese: 当时他接受八字肩带和三角巾悬挂固定的治疗。

sentences.english: Adjustable shoulder straps with metal buckle detail.
sentences.chinese: 可调式肩带，金属扣细节。

definition: a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
